result.eng: The editor will be attending a conference in Italy next week.
result.ga: beidh an t-eagarthóir ag freastal ar chomhdháil san iodáil an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.orig: beidh an t-eagarthóir ag freastal ar chomhdháil san iodáil an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.html: beidh an t-eagarthóir ag freastal ar chomhdháil san iodáil an tseachtain seo chugainnThe editor will be attending a conference in Italy next week.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ an t-eagarṫóir ag freastal ar ċoṁḋáil san iodáil an tseaċtain seo ċugainnThe editor will be attending a conference in Italy next week.

result.eng: You didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ga: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.orig: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.html: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadhYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ aon ġá le heagarṫóir a ṫuilleaḋ le do leagan féin de ċeird na hiriseoireaċta a ċleaċtaḋYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
